channel.description: Recent content in Docs on REG Handbook

item.title: Twitter
item.description: Twitter # The group has a Twitter account @turinghut23. The purpose of the account is to have an informal public-facing channel where we can communicate about projects we are working on and about life as a research engineer at the Turing. If you want to tweet under the group account, ask the account controller for access. Do post about # Projects we work on (if public) Blog posts Talks that we organise Conferences and workshops Any public outputs - papers, published code etc.
